Text: I really hate when people post their screen shots and cover images through a click-pay site that completely obscures the image.  Please find an image host that places ads AROUND not OVER.  I'm going to start giving these torrents -1 each time the preview image is obstructed.
^ Or you could get an ad-block addon for your browser, I didn't notice any ads
Great torrent... horny babe and no ads at all at the screen shots. Thankx. :-)
